title: Jailor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Throw a grenade at someone each night, dealing a Powerful attack to them and a random one of their other visitors.
- Phase another player out each night, negating their ability and all abilities targetting them for that night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a magic box that stores the first non-attacking ability used against you, negating it. You then gain that ability.
- You may use any number of different abilities each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 352
*Why did the bar walk into the chicken? To get to the other horse!*
